name: King's Shield
effect: Reaction. Shield Move. Reduce the damage the User suffers by their Rank. If the move that strikes the user is a Contact move, the foe's Strength is lowered by 2. This move always uses the user's Base Vitality.
description: The pokemon uses a ghostly shield to protect itself. If the foe managed to touch it, the user will drain some of it's life force.
